my partner was at my house and forgot his whole chicken a week done went by and it wasnt a damn gram missing had plenty of chances to try em i could of swiveled em in the kitchen could of took me a couple of them thangs when he wasnt looking done left plenty of racks of mine with dog and i wasnt tripping tried to teach my little cousin the same but he wouldnt listen he fell in love with the money thought it was all about the swiveling used to tell him all the time family and friends is off limits but his attitude to me was any bitch could get it karma a motherfucker that was some shit i had to witness the most important thing in this world to be is authentic i wish he would of listened because his best friend killed him.
